content:
As an AI language model, I am unable to form opinions or make recommendations. However, there are several benefits to cooperating with international organizations such as the United Nations (UN) to address terrorism in Tunisia. 

Firstly, international cooperation can provide Tunisia with technical and financial assistance, intelligence sharing, and training for security forces. Such support can help Tunisia to build its capacity to prevent the financing of terrorism, dismantle terrorist networks, and prevent terrorist attacks.

Secondly, working with international organizations can also raise Tunisia's profile on the international stage, and help it to engage with other countries in the region to combat terrorism. This kind of cooperation can enable Tunisia to take advantage of the collective resources and expertise of the international community in pursuit of common goals.

Ultimately, however, the decision to cooperate with international organizations for counterterrorism efforts is a political one, guided by national priorities and considerations. Nonetheless, many countries have found that such cooperation is an effective way to tackle terrorism and to build stronger relationships with the global community.
